Question.Subject: im making a website? what should it be for or about why would everyone like it what should it be called im 13?
Question.Content: what should it be for or about why would everyone like it what should it be called im 13 and a girl
Question.ChosenAnswer: Have polls about preferences that other teens can answer. Most people consider their own opinions extremely important, so this should appeal to many people. Ask for their top 3 favorite school lunches, recording artists, school subject, colors, authors/books, places to go on holiday, and things like that. Call it something like "My Top 3" or some such thing. If you want, ask for their bottom 3 as well.

Answer.Content: Have polls about preferences that other teens can answer. Most people consider their own opinions extremely important, so this should appeal to many people. Ask for their top 3 favorite school lunches, recording artists, school subject, colors, authors/books, places to go on holiday, and things like that. Call it something like "My Top 3" or some such thing. If you want, ask for their bottom 3 as well.
